actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the public assistance provisions of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits thereunder (including supplemental security income benefits) shall be made available and financed in the case of Guam and the Virgin Islands on the same basis as in the case of other States.

summary.text: Amends Title XI (General Provisions), Title IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children), Title X (Grants to States for Aid to the Blind), Title XIV (Grants to States for Aid to the Permanently Blind and Disabled), Title XIX (Medicaid), Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income Program), and Title XX (Grants to States for services) of the Social Security Act to extend specified public assistance benefits under such titles to Guam and the Virgin Islands on the same basis as in the case of other States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the public assistance provisions of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits thereunder (including supplemental security income benefits) shall be made available and financed in the case of Guam and the Virgin Islands on the same basis as in the case of other States.
